abstract: Arizona Diamondbacks acquire Milwaukee Brewers shortstop Jean Segura in five-player trade; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Arizona Diamondbacks tried to bolster their lineup, acquiring Jean Segura, a former National League All-Star shortstop, in a five-player trade with the Milwaukee Brewers.
snippet: The Arizona Diamondbacks tried to bolster their lineup, acquiring Jean Segura, a former National League All-Star shortstop, in a five-player trade with the Milwaukee Brewers.
